description: We flash back to Louis (Michael Lucas) hooking up with a john (Jason Ridge) that he met at a hustler bar. Reclaiming his escort past, Louis takes care to work his john up, sucking his toes, eating his ass, and feeding him his large, uncut cock before fucking his brains out in multiple positions. Satisfied, the john pays Louis, who turned back to hustling after the death of his lover (Spencer Quest) put him in financial straits.
title: Michael Lucas Escorts Jason Ridge
